org.richfaces.application
Class ServiceLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.richfaces.application.ServiceLoader

public final class ServiceLoader
extends Object

This class loads services from files placed to the META-INF/services in classpath.

Author:
asmirnov@exadel.com
